verses.verse: To the chief Musician, <WH5329> to <WH5921> Jeduthun, <WH3038> A Psalm <WH4210> of David. <WH1732> Truly <WH389> my soul <WH5315> waiteth <WH1747> upon <WH413> God: <WH430> from <WH4480> him cometh my salvation. <WH3444>
He <WH1931> only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation; <WH3444> he is my defense; <WH4869> I shall not <WH3808> be greatly <WH7227> moved. <WH4131>

How long <WH5704> <WH575> will ye imagine mischief <WH2050> against <WH5921> a man? <WH376> ye shall be slain <WH7523> all <WH3605> of you: as a bowing <WH5186> wall <WH7023> shall ye be, and as a tottering <WH1760> fence. <WH1447>

They only <WH389> consult <WH3289> to cast him down <WH5080> from his excellency: <WH4480> <WH7613> they delight <WH7521> in lies: <WH3577> they bless <WH1288> with their mouth, <WH6310> but they curse <WH7043> inwardly. <WH7130> Selah. <WH5542>
My soul, <WH5315> wait <WH1826> thou only <WH389> upon God; <WH430> for <WH3588> my expectation <WH8615> is from <WH4480> him.
He <WH1931> only <WH389> is my rock <WH6697> and my salvation: <WH3444> he is my defense; <WH4869> I shall not <WH3808> be moved. <WH4131>
In <WH5921> God <WH430> is my salvation <WH3468> and my glory: <WH3519> the rock <WH6697> of my strength, <WH5797> and my refuge, <WH4268> is in God. <WH430>
Trust <WH982> in him at all <WH3605> times; <WH6256> ye people, <WH5971> pour out <WH8210> your heart <WH3824> before <WH6440> him: God <WH430> is a refuge <WH4268> for us. Selah. <WH5542>

Surely <WH389> men of low degree <WH1121> <WH120> are vanity, <WH1892> and men of high degree <WH1121> <WH376> are a lie: <WH3577> to be laid <WH5927> in the balance, <WH3976> they <WH1992> are altogether <WH3162> lighter than vanity. <WH4480> <WH1892>

Trust <WH982> not <WH408> in oppression, <WH6233> and become not vain <WH1891> <WH408> in robbery: <WH1498> if <WH3588> riches <WH2428> increase, <WH5107> set <WH7896> not <WH408> your heart <WH3820> upon them.
God <WH430> hath spoken <WH1696> once; <WH259> twice <WH8147> have I heard <WH8085> this; <WH2098> that <WH3588> power <WH5797> belongeth unto God. <WH430>
Also unto thee, O Lord, <WH136> belongeth mercy: <WH2617> for <WH3588> thou <WH859> renderest <WH7999> to every man <WH376> according to his work. <WH4639>
